stereopsis.settings.title: Stereopsis Config
stereopsis.settings.flipView.description: Switch between cross mode or parallel mode (Experimental).
stereopsis.settings.renderMode.descripti: The world render behavior when stereopsis is active.
stereopsis.settings.enableOnLaunch.descr: If enabled, stereopsis will enable automatically on game launch.
stereopsis.settings.maxXOffset.descripti: The max offset for the view to focus on the crosshair.
stereopsis.render_mode.duo.name: Duo
stereopsis.render_mode.duo.description: Renders two sides at once, provides best experience if no shader pack is loaded.
stereopsis.render_mode.single.name: Single
stereopsis.render_mode.single.descriptio: Renders one side at a time, attempts to fix shader pack glitches. If glitch persists, try F3+R (reload shaders).
stereopsis.render_mode.single_synced.des: Same as Single, but skips client ticking when rendering second frame. Might cause some side effects.
